participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake enjoys simple pleasures and takes pride in his rural lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i'm an electrician.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Supportive and sociable, Emily balances her coaching duties with family time and enjoys relaxing with a glass of wine.
participant_2.background: i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.
